# 2025 Presidential Tour of Turkey

| first_color        = cyan
| second             = Harold Martín López
| second_nat         = ECU
| second_team        =
| third              = Juan Guillermo Martínez
| third_nat          = COL
| third_team         =
| points             = Giovanni Lonardi
| points_nat         = ITA
| points_team        =
| points_color       = green
| mountains          = Wout Poels
| mountains_nat      = NED
| mountains_team     =
| mountains_color    = red
| sprints            = Willie Smit
| sprints_nat        = RSA
| sprints_team       =
| sprints_color      = white
| team_nat           = ESP
| team               =
| previous           = 2024
| next               = 2026

The 2025 Presidential Cycling Tour of Turkey is a road cycling stage race that is being held between 27 April and 4 May 2025 in Turkey. It is the 60th edition of the Presidential Tour of Turkey.
Teams
Three UCI WorldTeams, thirteen UCI ProTeams, and seven UCI Continental teams made up the 23 teams that participate in the race.
